channel.title: machine learning on Lukas Scheucher
channel.description: Recent content in machine learning on Lukas Scheucher

item.title: Neural Style Transfer
item.description:
In Neural Style Transfer, artifical neural networks are used to combine two images, such that the result has the content of one but the style of another image.

I go through the basic concepts and mathematical formulatins and also provide a working codebase for you to try.

A gallery with some of my proudest results is provided at the end :).

item.title: Sudoku Solver
item.description:
You can use the Sudoku Solver whenever you are stuck on a puzzle.

It can read a playing field either directly via webcam or by uploading a picture and quicklu provide you with the solution.
